Table of Contents

Class WorkspaceInfo

Represents information about a workspace.

Namespace: Realtime_ToDo_Web_API.Models
Remarks

This model is used to represent workspace to user. To see how workspace is stored in database see Workspace

Properties

Id

The unique identifier of the workspace.

Should not be changed by user

Name

The name of the workspace.

TaskCount

The number of tasks associated with the workspace.

This property is genereted by counting tasks in Workspace.Tasks
